thread.section_title: PhoneIndia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PhoneIndia.com | phoneindia.com | 2 of 40
thread.title: Mahesh Ramrakhiani

author: Mahesh Ramrakhiani
title: Mahesh Ramrakhiani
text:
I have been using this for many years now. It cost effective and very convenient to use. I can use the same account on multiple phones. All my family members mobile phones, home landline and office landline are connected via same pin.
I don't need to remember the pin once my phones are registered with the site. I have my shortcut keys stored for all my contacts in india, whom I call with press of single/double keys.
I never lost any extra pence when phone does not connect. No connection fee. I am more than satisfied and I have already recommended this to many other friends of mine.
